headline: Going to IETF 95? Join the TLS 1.3 hackathon
keywords: Hackathon, TLS, HTTPS, Events, TLS 1.3, South America, Security, IETF
description: If youâ€™re in Buenos Aires on April 2-3 and are interested in building, come join the IETF Hackathon. CloudFlare and Mozilla will be working on TLS 1.3, the first new version of TLS in eight years!
